name: ORS Scheduled Prison Activities
description:
This report shows scheduled prison activities as shown on the MAINTAIN PRISON ACTIVITIES screen in CNOMIS.

Runtime prompts will ask for an Establishment Code and to select if active, inactive or all activities are to be shown.
ACT0020 - v00.00.01 Last Modified: 07/05/14

dataset.name: Prison Activities
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.AGY_LOC_ID AS AGY_LOC_ID, AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.DESCRIPTION AS ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION, AT_ACTIVITY_LOCATION.DESCRIPTION AS ACTIVITY_LOCATION, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.IEP_LEVEL AS IEP_LEVEL, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.SCHEDULE_START_DATE AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.SCHEDULE_END_DATE AS SCHEDULE_END_DATE, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.CAPACITY AS CAPACITY, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.CAPACITY - DT_COURSE_VACANCY.RESGISTRATION_COUNT AS VACANCY, CASE WHEN AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.SCHEDULE_END_DATE >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP OR AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.SCHEDULE_END_DATE IS NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ACTIVE_ACTIVITY_FLAG FROM OMS_OWNER.COURSE_ACTIVITIES AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES, OMS_OWNER.PROGRAM_SERVICES AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_ACTIVITY_LOCATION, (SELECT crs_acty_id, COUNT(*) AS resgistration_count FROM offender_program_profiles WHERE offender_program_status = 'ALLOC' GROUP BY crs_acty_id) DT_COURSE_VACANCY WHERE (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID = AT_ACTIVITY_LOCATION.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.PROGRAM_ID = AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES.PROGRAM_ID) AND (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.CRS_ACTY_ID = DT_COURSE_VACANCY.CRS_ACTY_ID (+)) AND (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Activity Establishment Code:','A','Prison Activities\Activity Establishment Code',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND CASE WHEN AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.SCHEDULE_END_DATE >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP OR AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.SCHEDULE_END_DATE IS NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END = (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Active Activities: Y/N or leave blank for all:','A',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1,optional) */))), dataset_ AS (SELECT AGY_LOC_ID, DESCRIPTION, ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION, ACTIVITY_LOCATION, IEP_LEVEL, SCHEDULE_START_DATE, SCHEDULE_END_DATE, CAPACITY, VACANCY, ACTIVE_ACTIVITY_FLAG FROM dataset_base_)

parameters.name: establishment_code
parameters.description: @prompt('Enter Activity Establishment Code:','A','Prison Activities\Activity Establishment Code',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0)

parameters.name: unknown_parameter
parameters.display: Active Activities: Y/N or leave blank for all:
parameters.description: @prompt('Active Activities: Y/N or leave blank for all:','A',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1,optional)
